mythical.maze

Class ErrorLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • mythical.maze.ErrorLogger

  • public class ErrorLogger
extends java.lang.Object
    Logs system errors to a dedicated log file.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ErrorLogger() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void logIOError(java.lang.String message, java.lang.Exception e)
      Logs an IOException into the error log file and terminates game if unable to continue.
      static void logRuntimeError(java.lang.String message, java.lang.Exception e)
      Logs a Runtime Exception into the error log file.
      static void setupError()
      Sets up error log with correct formatting and tools to append existing messages.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • logRuntimeError

        public static void logRuntimeError(java.lang.String message,
                                   java.lang.Exception e)
        Logs a Runtime Exception into the error log file.
        Parameters:
        message - an appropriate message describing the exception.
        e - the exception itself; includes location and path.

      • logIOError

        public static void logIOError(java.lang.String message,
                              java.lang.Exception e)
        Logs an IOException into the error log file and terminates game if unable to continue.
        Parameters:
        message - an appropriate message describing the exception.
        e - the exception itself; includes location and path.
